title: Global brands
description: Throughout my career I worked a lot with global brands like Visa, Delta, Amway, Mondelez, RaceTrac, and more. I've designed and lead various of projects, from websites and apps to global campaigns.

title: Visa Website (2022–2025)
description: Directed Visa's digital rebranding rollout. I built the global design system in Figma, replacing our Sketch workflows so teams worldwide could ship consistent, accessible products faster. We created a ton of web pages and campaigns that established the new visual identity across digital. I also explored opportunities for what the site could become—ideas that are now reflected in the new website launching in 2026. We're continuing to work together on this.

title: UI/UX design
description: Led product design for Visa's global digital presence. Websites, apps, dashboards. Directed redesigns for Amway, RaceTrac, Delta Airlines.

title: Design systems
description: Built design systems for Visa, RaceTrac, Amway, and more. Components, tokens, variables, documentation — foundations that scale across teams.

title: Product partner
description: Partner, not executor. Formulate hypotheses, connect design to metrics, run workshops with dev teams. Bridge design and engineering to ship what was designed.

title: AI workflows
description: Building the new design workflow. Claude Code, Cursor, Antigravity, MCP tools — using AI systematically across research, ideation, prototyping, and code.

title: Typography
description: Deep love for type. Created Peace Sans — 500K+ downloads. Typography is the foundation of everything I design.

title: Strong design foundations
description: Composition, typography, color, form — shaped by years in branding. Featured in Logolounge, Dieline, Packaging of the World.

title: Logo design
description: 100+ logos designed throughout my career. From startups to federal brands — identity systems that last.

title: Building apps & tools
description: Love creating internal tools that solve real problems. From task managers to prototyping apps — if it doesn't exist, I build it.

title: Figma plugins
description: Improving design workflows through custom Figma plugins. If the tool doesn't do what I need, I extend it.

title: California culture
description: Inspired by skate, surf, snowboard culture. Old skate magazine aesthetics, 80s California vibe — it's part of who I am.
